Settings Protocols¶

When working with settings, static values are sometimes not flexible enough. gordon provides severals protocol which will allow you to customize your settings.

It is important to understand the difference between Settings Protocols and Parameters Protocols. Settings protocols are evaluated on build time, and parameter_protocols on apply.

On build time there is a limited amount of things we can allow you to customize using protocols. This is because we don’t want you to shoot yourself in the foot.

Reference ref://¶

You can reference parameters using ref://NameOfTheParameter as value of your setting.

Example:

---
s3:
  my_s3_integration:
    bucket: ref://MyBucket
    notifications:
      ...
